name: The Future (Hexterion)
description:
This game was completed for the B.E.A.N.S (Because Earth Actually Needs Saving) jam hosted by Glasgow Caledonian University. This jam is to represent the unsustainable industrial farming currently happening on earth.

Our game is designed to be played on a projector in a school environment. Players will be split up into teams and left to debate the choices presented in-front of them for problems around the world. After the choices have been locked in the earth will simulate 20 years real time and display how the players actions have affected the earth, for good or for worse.

By Andrew Graham, Alex MacDiarmid, Kyle McSwan and Anna Kousouri
